pullRequest.title: AF-2424 :Issue with the group permissions for the Pages
pullRequest.bodyText:
Added the grant permission for reading Home perpective when a new group is added.
An entry for new group will be made in security-properties.properties when a new group is created, earlier group entry was only made when that group is edited

commit.message:
AF-2424 : Issue with the group permissions for the Pages

 - Adding HomePage access after a group is created

(cherry picked from commit 84bb8fb0b947e7326ce060bc329a6103c13a5461)

AF-2424 :Issue with the group permissions for the Pages
- Added the grant permission for reading Home perpective when a new group is added.
- An entry for new group will be made in security-properties.properties when a new group is created, unlike earlier where entry was made only when we edit a group properties

- An entry for new group will be made in security-properties.properties when a new group is created, unlike earlier where entry was made only when we edit a group properties

afterCommit.message:
AF-2424 :Issue with the group permissions for the Pages
- Added the grant permission for reading Home perpective when a new group is added.
- An entry for new group will be made in security-properties.properties when a new group is created, unlike earlier where entry was made only when we edit a group properties

nodes.bodyText: @caponetto I moved this event listener to this GroupCreationWorkflow.java to have better separation of concern and easy code coverage for this function. Since it was failing the sonar cloud code coverage.
